title: The Journey Begins
content: I started learning how to code! First with C++, then C# and finally moving onto HTML/CSS, Javascript and Ruby on Rails.

title: Lighthouse Labs
content: Graduated at Lighthouse Labs with a Immersive Web Development diploma.

title: Food.ee
content: At Food.ee I got hands on experience developing an AngularJS app from scratch. I rebuilt the app without replacing the css or html by completely replacing the javascript.

title: Edvisor.IO
content: I was Edvisor's first developer, meaning I architected their application from the ground up. After they hired the rest of the team I managed the developers while taking up the responsibility for making sure we had our build system and tooling working on point.

title: Dropcuff
content: Dropcuff is a startup I co-created that is currently being developed by my team and I. We are developing an app that will bring equity to the music industry.

title: NRG eSports
content: At NRG I created a highly available backend with Elixir using Absinthe and Phoenix, I also developed part of the frontend in Angular.

title: Samacare
content: During my time at Samacare I architected a backend application with Elixir and a frontend PWA with Angular.

title: Artist Portfolio
content: I was commissioned to build Pilar Guinea Gil's artist portfolio which I designed and developed from scratch using Angular and a bit of AWS Lambda.

title: Freelancer
content: I became a freelancer! I work out of my own company (Mika Software), and take contracts that are interesting, contact me if you have a project that needs working on.
